data.title: Tivoli Software
data.meta_description: In 1996, Tivoli Systems, an enterprise systems management software developer, was acquired by IBM, who subsequently made it a subsidiary, Tivoli Software. IBM began phasing Tivoli Software as a brand in 2013, finally absorbing the rest of its portfolio into IBM at large in 2016.
